document.full_text: richard goldstone, the south african jurist who led a united nations report accusing israel of possible war crimes in gaza and recently recanted some of its harshest conclusions, has agreed to visit israel in july.
document.title: head of gaza inquiry is said to plan israel trip
lines_and_colors: richard goldstone, the south african jurist who led a united nations report accusing israel of possible war crimes in gaza and recently recanted some of its harshest conclusions, has agreed to visit israel in july.
